content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed begins with Expert Testimony, from The FBI In Peace And War. That story first aired April 20, 1955.

(23:30) Yours Truly, Johnny Dollar brings us The Horace Lockhart Matter to close this week’s show. That episode aired August 1, 1951.

Download CaseClosed693

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’re able to help, please visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
